meanings.definition: Large in amount, size, or extent.
meanings.sent1: The hefty box was difficult to lift.
meanings.sent2: She carried a hefty bag of groceries home.
meanings.sent3: The hefty snowman looked comical in the yard.
meanings.sent4: His hefty appetite could never be satisfied.
meanings.sent5: The hefty elephant lumbered through the jungle.

meanings.sent1: The hefty hammer easily drove the nail into the wood.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler had a hefty grip on his opponent.
meanings.sent3: The hefty anchor sank quickly to the ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: Her hefty determination carried her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The hefty boulder blocked the path up the mountain.

meanings.sent1: The hefty paycheck made him smile.
meanings.sent2: She received a hefty sum for her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The hefty cake was devoured in minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: His hefty collection of books filled the entire shelf.
meanings.sent5: The hefty crowd cheered loudly at the concert.
